text: Paul Ri Moun-hi (14 September 1935 â€“ 14 March 2021) was a South Korean Roman Catholic archbishop. He was born in Daegu. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1965. He was auxiliary bishop, coadjutor archbishop and archbishop of the Roman Catholic Archdiocese of Daegu, South Korea, from 1972 until 2007. Ri Moun-hi died on 14 March 2021, in Daegu at the age of 85.Archbishop Paul Ri Moun-hi == References == Category:1935 births Category:2021 deaths Category:South Korean Roman Catholic bishops Category:Roman Catholic archbishops
title: Paul Ri Moun-hi
